item.title: Leaving Earth is a Constraint Satisfaction Problem
item.description: I want to show that mission-planning in Leaving Earth is just one big constraint satisfaction problem. Leaving Earth?> Leaving Earth? # Leaving Earth is a independently-produced board game with striking art that recreates the space race of the 1960s and 1970s.
